items.sentence: I came to the conclusion that I had been deceived.
I caught a glimpse of him as he turned the corner.
Tom said he saw Mary spanking one of her children.
Tom said he thought it was time for him to retire.
I want to eat something that\'s not hot and spicy.
I heard Tom bragging about how much money he made.
I need to know everything that you know about Tom.
I took it for granted that Tom could speak French.
Tom had the only pool in town with a diving board.
You don\'t know anything about basketball, do you?
